PreConditions

  1. You have installed XSockets. Setup Example or anything equal to this
  2. If you are NOT using the XSocketHandler project that is installed with XSockets
    • See to it that the assembly get copied to the pluginfolder (see XSocketHandler postbuild events)
  3. Add a refernce to XSockets.Extensibility.Interceptors.dll (found under XSocketServerPlugins)

Code - ConnectionInterceptor

  1. We just create a basic ConnectionInterceptor by using the Scaffolders (available for all interceptor types)
    1. Open up the Package Manager Console
    2. Write: Scaffold XConnectionInterceptor MyConnectionInterceptor
    3. This will create a new ConnectionInterceptor name MyConnectionInterceptor
    [Export(typeof(IConnectionInterceptor))]
public sealed class MyConnectionInterceptor : XBaseInterceptor, IConnectionInterceptor
{
    public void Connected(IXBaseSocket socket)
    {
        //Implement your interceptor stuff here...
    }

    public void Disconnected(IXBaseSocket socket)
    {
        //Implement your interceptor stuff here...
    }
}
NOTE: Read the next section 2-Debugging/ for knowing howto debug your plugins
